errors.ERROR_02: The entered e-mail address is not valid.
errors.ERROR_03: This field must not contain more than 255 characters
errors.ERROR_04: The password must be at least 8 characters long
errors.ERROR_05: The password confirmation entered does not match the entered password.
errors.ERROR_06: The phone number entered is incorrect.
errors.ERROR_07: There is a user with e-mail {{ email }} registered in the system.
errors.ERROR_09: This user is blocked. Please contact Technical Support!
errors.ERROR_10: Jums nav tiesību piekļūt šim resursam! You don't have the necessary permissions to access this resource!
errors.ERROR_11: Jums nav tiesību veikt šo darbību! You don't have the necessary permissions to do this action!
errors.ERROR_12: Only team members can access this resource. Please contact the team manager of {{ teamName }}!
errors.ERROR_13: Only company managers can access this resource. Please contact the company manager of {{ companyName }}!
errors.ERROR_14: An error has occured during the processing of the request. Please, try again.

success.SUCCESS_05: User has been deleted from the system successfully!

confirm.CONFIRM_01: Are you sure you want to delete your own user profile from the system? By doing this action, all user data will be deleted, and you won't be able to access the system again. This action can't be undone
confirm.CONFIRM_02: Are you sure you want to delete this user from the system? By doing this action, all data of this user will be deleted, and he/she won't be able to access the system. This action can't be undone.
confirm.CONFIRM_03: Are you sure you want to delete this company from the system? By doing this action, all of company's data, including its owned teams and its tasks will be deleted. This action can't be undone.

index.headline: Add task management to your own workflow
index.headlinetext: Designed for personal and business use!
